name: Buff Babies
description:
BUFF BABIES

Buff Babies is about a baby who is unknowingly in a dream, fighting to avoid bedtime. Fight through the monsters of the dream, collect pickups and get candy along the way.  At the end, you fight your dad who wants to put you to bed. String light and heavy combos together and mix and match your aerial and running attacks to take out your enemies as the most buff baby ever.  Can you make it out of the dream?

CONTROLS

Play with an xbox or other controller:

A - Jump/Select

B - Back

Left Analog Stick - Movement

RB - Light attack

RT - Heavy attack

START - Pause
